BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.check.datasource.MySQLDataSourceChecker holds a map-type field org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.check.datasource.MySQLDataSourceChecker.REQUIRED_VARIABLES, but uses it as only a List
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.check.datasource.MySQLDataSourceChecker.checkPrivilege(DataSource) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.check.datasource.MySQLDataSourceChecker.checkPrivilege(DataSource) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.check.datasource.MySQLDataSourceChecker.checkVariable(DataSource) converts checked exception to unchecked

Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ddlgenerator.MySQLCreateTableSQLGenerator.generate(DataSource, String, String) converts checked exception to unchecked instead of another allowable checked exception
This use of java/sql/Statement.executeQuery(Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/sql/ResultSet; can be vulnerable to SQL injection (with JDBC)
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.MySQLIncrementalDumper.handleEvent(AbstractBinlogEvent) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method new org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.MySQLIncrementalDumper(DumperConfiguration, IngestPosition, PipelineChannel, PipelineTableMetaDataLoader) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly
This random generator (java.util.Random) is predictable
This method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.binlog.BinlogPosition.toLong() parses a String that is a field
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.MySQLClient.waitExpectedResponse(Class) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.MySQLClient.waitExpectedResponse(Class) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.MySQLClient.waitExpectedResponse(Class) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.MySQLClient.connect() needlessly boxes a boolean constant

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.PasswordEncryption.encryptWithRSAPublicKey(String, byte[], String, String) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.PasswordEncryption.formatKey(String) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding
This API SHA-1 (SHA-1) is not a recommended cryptographic hash function

org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLCommandPacketDecoder.decodeResponsePacket(MySQLPacketPayload, List): 2nd parameter 'out' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLCommandPacketDecoder.decodeFieldPacket(MySQLPacketPayload) uses a Side Effect Constructor
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLCommandPacketDecoder.decodeRowDataPacket(MySQLPacketPayload, List) uses a Side Effect Constructor

Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLNegotiateHandler.channelRead(ChannelHandlerContext, Object) converts checked exception to unchecked instead of another allowable checked exception

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLNegotiateHandler.channelRead(ChannelHandlerContext, Object) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLNegotiateHandler.channelRead(ChannelHandlerContext, Object) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLNegotiateHandler.channelRead(ChannelHandlerContext, Object) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLNegotiateHandler.generateAuthResponse(byte[]) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLNegotiateHandler.handleCachingSha2Auth(ChannelHandlerContext, MySQLAuthMoreDataPacket) encodes String bytes without specifying the character encoding
Static or private method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.mysql.ingest.client.netty.MySQLNegotiatePackageDecoder.decodeResponsePacket(MySQLPacketPayload, List) has unused parameters
